Html: I googled it, but got no real answer; what exactly does the Comparison: Item Budget show me?

Each stat has a relative value that it takes up on an item. ie, you can put more spelldamage on an item than mp5. So an item can have 10 int OR 11.7 dmg OR 10 spr OR 10 crit OR 10 hit OR 10 haste OR 4 mp5. The Item Budget chart shows you the value of each of those amounts. So it's the effective value of that stat, per itemization point.
